explanation: Several participants express caution or warn of a possible short-term dump for BTC. Some expect further downside before a breakout. There are mixed views, but the negative/neutral opinions slightly outweigh the bullish ones in the very short term. Bot-based strategies and advice to use low leverage and cautious stop-losses suggest increased volatility.
